data.description:
FIGHT together against different enemies in the Hex7 Battle Arena.
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974468_332017743231769_3438180485989163490_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=Ag4cyxA2RTcQ7kNvgGUK6p5&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYD_8fHjwxZgsOadgOeirl9z8g8GY92_QJe6IL3kf9DGIg&oe=66AB6FB7)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game a much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75507168_1446865232891556_3763410573840822716_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=oYbDmljKAG4Q7kNvgELLQNw&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDDzSsc7fc629zDD5XnEXKXVy-HPgYvHPjGJubuV5I3AA&oe=66AB7D52)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003262_985625342809911_4235982824831484550_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=kNCSCPZWXT8Q7kNvgEpyKnQ&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAVpl3QAWnwsfX2DckcMNhsbSi8nr1j91izlSgUbiNYzA&oe=66AB6889)
